title: Provides that restaurants must give notice of price of specials and credit card limitations
summary: Provides that restaurants must conspicuously post and give notice of price of specials and credit card limitations; defines "restaurant" and "specials"; imposes a civil penalty of $100 and a subsequent violation occurring within twelve months of the first violation shall be $250.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to posting of prices of specials and posting notice of credit card limitations in restaurants
